Gold.en: Jabs the foe twice using stingers.

Silver.en: Jabs the foe twice using stingers.

Crystal.en: Jabs the foe twice using stingers.

Ruby.en: Stingers on the forelegs jab the foe twice.

Sapphire.en: Stingers on the forelegs jab the foe twice.

Emerald.en: Stingers on the forelegs jab the foe twice.

FireRed.en: The foe is stabbed twice with foreleg stingers. It may poison the foe.
FireRed.de: Stacheln an den Vorderbeinen treffen den Gegner 2-mal.

LeafGreen.en: The foe is stabbed twice with foreleg stingers. It may poison the foe.
LeafGreen.de: Stacheln an den Vorderbeinen treffen den Gegner 2-mal.

Diamond.en: The foe is stabbed twice by a pair of stingers. It may also poison the target.
Diamond.de: Stacheln an den Vorderbeinen treffen den Gegner zweimal.

Pearl.en: The foe is stabbed twice by a pair of stingers. It may also poison the target.
Pearl.de: Stacheln an den Vorderbeinen treffen den Gegner zweimal.

Platinum.en: The foe is stabbed twice by a pair of stingers. It may also poison the target.
Platinum.de: Stacheln an den Vorderbeinen treffen den Gegner zweimal. Gegner wird eventuell vergiftet.

HeartGold.en: The foe is stabbed twice by a pair of stingers. It may also poison the target.
HeartGold.de: Stacheln an den Vorderbeinen treffen den Gegner zweimal. Gegner wird eventuell vergiftet.

SoulSilver.en: The foe is stabbed twice by a pair of stingers. It may also poison the target.
SoulSilver.de: Stacheln an den Vorderbeinen treffen den Gegner zweimal. Gegner wird eventuell vergiftet.

Black.en: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. It may also poison the target.
Black.de: Stacheln an den Vorderbeinen treffen das Ziel zweimal. Ziel wird eventuell vergiftet.

White.en: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. It may also poison the target.
White.de: Stacheln an den Vorderbeinen treffen das Ziel zweimal. Ziel wird eventuell vergiftet.

Black_2.en: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. It may also poison the target.
Black_2.de: Stacheln an den Vorderbeinen treffen das Ziel zweimal. Ziel wird eventuell vergiftet.

White_2.en: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. It may also poison the target.
White_2.de: Stacheln an den Vorderbeinen treffen das Ziel zweimal. Ziel wird eventuell vergiftet.

X.en: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. This may also poison the target.
X.de: Stacheln an den Vorderbeinen treffen das Ziel zweimal. Ziel wird eventuell vergiftet.

Y.en: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. This may also poison the target.
Y.de: Stacheln an den Vorderbeinen treffen das Ziel zweimal. Ziel wird eventuell vergiftet.

O.Ruby.en: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. This may also poison the target.

A.Sapphire.en: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. This may also poison the target.

Sun.en: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. This may also poison the target.
Sun.de: Stacheln treffen das Ziel zweimal. Das Ziel wird eventuell vergiftet.

Moon.en: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. This may also poison the target.
Moon.de: Stacheln treffen das Ziel zweimal. Das Ziel wird eventuell vergiftet.

Ultra_Sun.en: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. This may also poison the target.
Ultra_Sun.de: Stacheln treffen das Ziel zweimal. Das Ziel wird eventuell vergiftet.

Ultra_Moon.en: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. This may also poison the target.
Ultra_Moon.de: Stacheln treffen das Ziel zweimal. Das Ziel wird eventuell vergiftet.

Omega_Ruby.de: Stacheln treffen das Ziel zweimal. Das Ziel wird eventuell vergiftet.

Alpha_Sapphire.de: Stacheln treffen das Ziel zweimal. Das Ziel wird eventuell vergiftet.
